attributes.action: abolish council tax and replace with an increase in income tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A fair and equitable deal for all

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/counciltaxes/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
